titleStmt.title: The situation of paradise found out being an history of a late pilgrimage unto the Holy Land, with a necessary apparatus prefixt, giving light into the whole design ...
titleStmt.author: Coleraine, Henry Hare, Baron, 1636-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. and F.C. for S. Lowndes ... and H. Faithorne, and J. Kersey ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Attributed to Henry Coleraine. cf. NUC pre-1956.
